Ebbing Tide.name: Ebbing Tide
descriptions: Reduces the casting time of your Healing Wave spell by 0.1 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Healing Wave spell by 0.2 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Healing Wave spell by 0.3 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Healing Wave spell by 0.4 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Healing Wave spell by 0.5 sec.

Totemic Focus.name: Totemic Focus
descriptions: Reduces the Mana cost of your totems by 10%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your totems by 20%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your totems by 30%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your totems by 40%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your totems by 50%.

Spirit Journey.name: Spirit Journey
descriptions: Reduces the cooldown of your Reincarnation spell by 15 min and increases the amount of health and mana you reincarnate with by an additional 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of your Reincarnation spell by 30 min and increases the amount of health and mana you reincarnate with by an additional 30%.

Ancestral Healing.name: Ancestral Healing
descriptions: Increases your target's armor value by 8% for 15 seconds after getting a critical effect from one of your healing spells.
Increases your target's armor value by 16% for 15 seconds after getting a critical effect from one of your healing spells.
Increases your target's armor value by 25% for 15 seconds after getting a critical effect from one of your healing spells.

Tidal Focus.name: Tidal Focus
descriptions: Reduces the Mana cost of your healing spells by 5%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your healing spells by 10%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your healing spells by 15%.

Reincarnation Totem.name: Reincarnation Totem
descriptions: Summons a Reincarnation Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster.  The totem allows allies who perish under its effects to resurrect with 20% health and mana.  Lasts 10 seconds.

Healing Focus.name: Healing Focus
descriptions: Gives you a 30% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting any healing spell.
Gives you a 50% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting any healing spell.
Gives you a 70% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting any healing spell.

Totemic Mastery.name: Totemic Mastery
descriptions: The radius of your totems that affect friendly targets is increased by 10 yards.

Healing Grace.name: Healing Grace
descriptions: Reduces the threat generated by your healing spells by 10%.
Reduces the threat generated by your healing spells by 20%.
Reduces the threat generated by your healing spells by 30%.

Restorative Totems.name: Restorative Totems
descriptions: Increases the effect of your Mana Spring and Healing Stream Totems by 10%.
Increases the effect of your Mana Spring and Healing Stream Totems by 20%.
Increases the effect of your Mana Spring and Healing Stream Totems by 30%.
Increases the effect of your Mana Spring and Healing Stream Totems by 40%.
Increases the effect of your Mana Spring and Healing Stream Totems by 50%.

Tidal Mastery.name: Tidal Mastery
descriptions: Increases the critical effect chance of your healing and lightning spells by 1%.
Increases the critical effect chance of your healing and lightning spells by 2%.
Increases the critical effect chance of your healing and lightning spells by 3%.
Increases the critical effect chance of your healing and lightning spells by 4%.
Increases the critical effect chance of your healing and lightning spells by 5%.

Healing Way.name: Healing Way
descriptions: Your Lesser Healing Wave spells have a 33% chance to increase the effect of subsequent Healing Wave spells on that target by 5% for 15 seconds.  This effect will stack up to 5 times.
Your Lesser Healing Wave spells have a 66% chance to increase the effect of subsequent Healing Wave spells on that target by 5% for 15 seconds.  This effect will stack up to 5 times.
Your Lesser Healing Wave spells have a 100% chance to increase the effect of subsequent Healing Wave spells on that target by 5% for 15 seconds.  This effect will stack up to 5 times.

Ancestral Guidance.name: Ancestral Guidance
descriptions: Increases your healing power by an amount equal to 10% of your total Spirit.
Increases your healing power by an amount equal to 20% of your total Spirit.
Increases your healing power by an amount equal to 30% of your total Spirit.
Increases your healing power by an amount equal to 40% of your total Spirit.
Increases your healing power by an amount equal to 50% of your total Spirit.

Nature's Swiftness.name: Nature's Swiftness
descriptions: When activated, your next Nature spell with a casting time less than 10 sec. becomes an instant cast spell.

Purification.name: Purification
descriptions: Increases the effectiveness of your healing spells by 2%.
Increases the effectiveness of your healing spells by 4%.
Increases the effectiveness of your healing spells by 6%.
Increases the effectiveness of your healing spells by 8%.
Increases the effectiveness of your healing spells by 10%.

Riptide.name: Riptide
descriptions: Heals a friendly target for 470 and another 3 over 15 seconds. Your next Chain Heal cast on that primary target within 15 seconds will consume the healing over time effect and increase the amount of the Chain Heal by 25%.
